item.description:
Christine Ucich, an experienced yogi and meditation expert will be leading us in some early morning yoga.  Please bring some breakfast if you wish so we can socialize a bit after.

This week we will be meeting at the gorgeous Wadsworth Mansion in a small pine tree grove! The scenery, the smells, it's AMAZING!! It is a sight to behold! If you haven't yet been here be sure to check it out.

There is no better way to start your mornings then with a yoga practice. Experience the meditative qualities of the beautiful scenery, coupled with gentle yoga focused on slow deep breathing and meditation.   Practicing yoga and meditating in the presence of the rising sun reinforces our connection to a life-giving spirit and the centre of our own being. It is also the most benficial way for gaining energy. The rays of the sun emit 'qi energy' or 'prana' that is present in the air at sunrise. This energy is able to renew and transform us during our practice.

This is going to be a very gentle yoga based on Taoist Yoga- so no experience necessary and Christine can offer alternative poses if needed.  Please bring a mat or blanket.

 

This is a partner event with Happy Healthy Mornings in Middletown...

http://www.meetup.com/Happy-Healthy-Mornings-in-Middletown/
item.how_to_find_us: practice spot is in back of mansion (on left side under pine trees)
item.name: Yoga at the Mansion!
